tier.item: `Taroo did not give anyone an apple.'
`Taroo did not give anyone an apple.'
Taroo did not give anyone an apple.
Dare-ga [vP [PP Hanako-ni] [v' [VP [NP ringo] ti] [V age-mo]i-v]] si-nakat-ta.
No one gives Hanako an apple.
`Taroo did not hand anyone a book.'
`Taroo did not hand anyone a book.'
Taroo did not hand anyone a book.
`Taroo did not make a consultation with anyone.'
`Taroo did not make a consultation with anyone.'
Taroo did not make a consultation with anyone.
`Taroo did not make a strange consultation with anyone.'
`Taroo did not make a strange consultation with anyone.'
Taroo did not make a strange consultation with anyone.
`Taroo did not share the fortune with anyone.'
`Taroo did not share the fortune with anyone.'
Taroo did not share the fortune with anyone.
(8) Taroo-wa [vP [v' [dare-ni ] [v' [N [VP [NP zaisan]-no [V bunyo]] [N Ø]] v-mo]]] si-nakat-ta
